transcript:
Hello.
Hello. Hello.
Hello. Haan ji sir aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Han ji bolo na.
Ji ji Chandan baat kar raha hu mai sir IndiaMART se.
Han bolo.
Ji.
Bolo hello.
Hello.
Hello. Namaskar sir.
Han ji boliye kaun bol rahe ho?
Shanu Asalwar baat kar raha hu.
Han ji bolo na. To shayad pehle bhi baat hui na aapni to.
Baat hui thi han Sumit Choudhary se baat hui thi na kal aapki?
Han.
Ji. Aapni bhi shayad pehle baat hui hogi.
Nahi mai ye kehna chah raha hu aapka ek concern hai hamare paas usko close kar du mai?
Han?
Aapka ek concern hai hamare paas me usko close kar du mai?
Matlab?
Aapne WhatsApp pe Chandan Kumar ke liye not satisfied mark kiya tha usko close kar sakta hu mai?
Close matlab?
Service to aapne continue karne ke liye mana kar diya tha na kal to humne deactivation ke liye bhej diya hai to abhi aapka ek concern aur hai usko aur bata dijiye close kar de usko.
To wo to mai thodi karunga aap hi kar sakte hai yaar isko to.
Nahi aapki permission chahiye na aap permission de dijiye hum close kar dete hai usko.
Rehne do aise permission me rehne do usme kya hai?
Sir concern ki baat kar raha hu mai wo to close karna padega na services to account aapka deactivate ho jayega aaj sham 12 baje raat ko deactivate ho jayega kal aapne Sumit Choudhary se baat kari thi na ek ghanta baat hui thi shayad aapki.
Hmm.
To aapne mana kar diya tha ki karna hi nahi hai isme kafi sare approvals bhi diye the maine. Mai yaha par aapke liye business ke liye hi mai soch raha tha ki aapko kuch additionally cheeze hum karwa denge service agar aap renewal karate ho to. But aapne mana kar diya tha na aapne jo ye jo baatein abhi boli unhone kal boli ye jo abhi aap bol rahe ye baatein us time bhi bole the jab maine first time package liya tha.
Kya keh rahe ho? Baato pe to koi reh hi nahi raha na koi bhi. Bhai aisa karna hai aisa karna hai. Fark hai na sir sir fark hai hum servicing department se hai hum sales department se nahi hai ki aap aapse sirf paisa hi mangenge hum sirf renewal ke time pe hum renewal renewal chilla rahe hai iske alawa aur koi baat nahi hai. Aap renewal nahi karana chahte to hum forcefully aapse paisa thodi le lenge sir. Ye bataiye aap.
Han. Agar aap renewal nahi karana chahte hum jabardasti paisa thodi na le lenge aapse aapki marzi hai aap renewal karayenge to aapke business me enhance hoga nahi karayenge to hum to business service provider hai sir aap hamare sath deal kar rahe ho to ho sakta hai ki agar aapko business nahi mil paya hai ya service achi nahi mil payi hai to hum aapko char panch cheeze extra karke de de. Jo aapki 27000 ki service hai usko hum 50 60000 ki service aapko 28000 me karwa ke de de itna to kar sakte hai aapke liye.
50 60000 wale aap mere ko aadhe rate me karoge aisa to hai nahi company aapke aap kare degi. Are sir yaha par head of the department hu meri 150 logo ki team hai Sumit Choudhary bhi meri team me hai Chandan Kumar bhi meri team me hai meri aapse pehle bhi baat hui thi to agar mai as a head of the department aapko kuch cheeze commit kar raha hu aur mai aapko wo return me bhi de raha hu to fir wo cheez to karke denge na hum aapko. Aisa thodi na hai ki wo nahi hoga. Abhi aapki profile itni achi hai aap khud dekhiye agar aap organically 15000 ka koi staff apne paas rakh kar ke enquiry generate karwane jaoge sir to wo itni enquiry call generate nahi karwa payega jitni enquiry call IndiaMART aapko la kar ke de raha hai. Market me aap competition ho sir market me aapka naam hai IndiaMART ki. Usko bilkul khatam kar dene se to koi fayda nahi hone wala na sir. Aur mahine ka aapka investment kitna hai 2300 2300 ka investment hai aapka mahine ka. Customer aapko milega hi milega sir. Aisa nahi hai personally approach ye hai ki WhatsApp assistance group hum aapko iske case me de rahe the na sir.
Jo aap mere ko hai na ye zyadatar ye pareshan karne wale call to mere ko aani nahi chahiye main baat to ye hai. Zyada ho gaya sir. Ye jo call aate rehte hai na din me kam se kam agar 20 call bhi aa jaye 20 call me se kam se kam 18 call to aisi aati hai ki ek do piece wale to mere ko wo to aani nahi chahiye.
Nahi wo to sir wo to band karwa denge na hum wo to hamare hath me hai service se related to hamare hath me hi hongi cheeze. Mai to ye kehna chah raha hu ye to mere ko chahiye nahi kyuki din bhar me mere ko bhi aur time hota hai inse baat karne ka kaam nahi hai mere khyal me 20 logo se baat karne ka. Mai wahi mai wahi keh raha hu sir jo aapko hum WhatsApp pe assistance denge usme kya hoga ki hum aapko specially filter out karke by leads share kiya karenge aap jab chahe aap group me to active rahoge iske alawa IndiaMART ke platform pe bhi aapko by leads milengi. Additionally cheeze jo hum aapko karke de rahe hai usme fayda to aap hi ka hai na sir. Aur wo wo isi isi wajah se discussion ho bhi raha hai. Otherwise to sir aap agar prime client nahi hote hamare liye to abhi tak to aapki service band ho jati sir. Aap khud sochiye na aapne last year ka payment kab kiya tha aapko yaad hoga kab kiya tha aapne payment 24 October se bhi pehle aapne shayad payment kiya tha credit card ke through. Hmm. Theek hai ji. Service aapki chali hai service aapki chali hai 6 November tak. Aaj 7 tarikh hai abhi bhi aap by lead consume karke dekhiye aap kar sakte hai by lead consume aur aaj bhi aapne open karke dekha hai subah 7 baje. Hmm. 7:30 baje aapne open karke dekha hai IndiaMART app. To kahi na kahi sir wo enrichment hai kuch na kuch customer ki enquiry generate ho rahi hai. Investment ki to baat kar raha hu na sir mai. Ek saal me agar aapse mai 28000 mang raha hu to 28000 ka 12 me divide karke dekhiye aap 2300 ki service aati hai sir. Market ke marketing ke liye 2000 lagana mahine ki sir bahut badi baat nahi hai itne ki to aap chai coffee pee lete honge sir mahine me. Wo to baat sahi hai aapki baat maine aapko us time bhi bola tha sir pehli baat to maine aapko yahi bola tha mere ko inse zyada response nahi mil raha na. Sir respond milega aap ye samjhiye aapko kitna time hua IndiaMART pe aaye hue ek saal hua hai na sir. IndiaMART pe log kai kai saalo se business kar rahe hai to dheere dheere business banta hai na sir. Unka jo bade kaam hai unka ye zaroori nahi hai isi ki baat bade chote kaam ki to hai hi nahi na sir aap ye samjhiye aap bhi bataiye. Meri baat suno agar koi bhi jaise aap bol rahe ho ek banda koi panch saat saal se laga hua hai isme to zaroori nahi hai wo isi ke piche chal raha hai uske aur bhi koi business chal rahe honge ya kuch aur bhi kaam kar raha hoga tabhi to wo laga pa raha hai paisa. Sir wahi to baat hai na abhi aap aapka focus aapka focus to isi business pe hai na to aapka to aur zyada enrichment hona chahiye ki bhai ha mere ko isi business me rehna hai to kaise mai IndiaMART me top me dikhu aapka to wo sochna chahiye ki customer aapke rate leke ja raha hai agar customer aapse keh raha hai ki sir agar mere ko profit hota iske andar mere ko chalo theek hai maan leta hu mai saal bhar ke andar mere ko kuch nikla to mai ye zaroori thodi hai koi 28000 wale leta mai zyada wale le leta lene me to par mere ko laga hi nahi kuch iske liye additionally additionally hum aapko jo support de rahe hai uske liye hi to de rahe hai ki aapse do mahine baad fir aap samne se bologe ki bhai ab mera paisa yaha se nikal gaya ab mere ko batao isse badi aur kya service hai 90 din ka aapko mai time dunga 90 din me aapka pura paisa adjust hoga agar TrustSeal service me aap jana chahoge isse upar ki jo service hai jo top level pe hai us service me agar aap jana chahoge to aapka pura paisa minus kar denge usme. 90 din 90 din pura aapko time milega teen mahine aap service use kariye teen mahine me aap paisa nikaliye yaha se uske baad aapko keval aur keval 20 25000 dene padenge upar ke aapki service puri TrustSeal me convert kar denge ye bhi option aapko de raha hu mai. Aap mujhe bataiye na abhi. Sir dekhiye business chalane ke liye do teen percent nahi 100% risk lena padta hai aur yaha par risk wali baat nahi hai aapko ek saal me hum 850 by leads dene ki baat kar rahe hai uske against me hum aapko enquiry call WhatsApp assistance by lead ka alag se package aur ye sab included karke de rahe hai na 2000 me sir 2300 me. To wo cheez aap dekhiye ki aapke liye valuable hai ki nahi hai market me aap koi cheez kharidne nikle aapne ek saal pehle koi cheez kharidi aapko jitni valuable lagti hai aap decision maker baniye na sir. Thoda kam agar aapko lag raha hai to mai isko hold karwa deta hu sir isko process karwa dijiye. Nahi to credit card se EMI karwa dunga mai aapki monthly. Monthly to dekho monthly to yaar wo nahi ho payega aapke wo to isme kam nahi ho sakta kya aur thoda bahut. Sir aap ye dekhiye kisi bhi company ko allow nahi hai ki hum 32000 se niche ka renewal de de kisi ko bhi aap check kar lijiye khud IndiaMART ka app open kariye renew now pe click kariye ya fir aap pay.indiamart.com pe jaiye waha MDC one year ka price kya hai aap check kariye 33760 aapko pay karne ke liye bolega wo. Hmm. Aapne pichle saal 28000 ki service li thi wahi same amount hi aapko pay karna hai sir mai to itna kar sakta hu aapke liye. Kisi bhi client ko aap helpline number pe bhi call karke puchoge waha pe bhi aapko 32000 plus GST ki service batayega sir wo. To mai to aapse ek rupya bhi faltu nahi mangne ki koshish kar raha hu sir aur at least maine aapko ye bhi bola hai ki jo 33040 aap pay kar rahe ho wo aapke 90 din tak pure pure adjustable rahenge sir. Teen teen mahine ka samay milega teen mahine me ache se aap paisa nikaliye apna aur wapas se 20 25000 laga ke top me aa jaiye. Aapko bhi pata hai aapka naam kaha dikhta hai aap bahut ache se jante ho sir. Bar bar usi cheez ko discuss karke koi fayda nahi hai. Jo log aapke Rajasthan se TrustSeal service chala rahe hai unko bhi to respond mil hi raha hoga na sir. To waha pe aapka naam bhi aa jayega top me top one top two me rahoge aap pan India me. Customer reach badhegi to definitely aapka business to badhega hi na sir. Business ROI me 2 2500 mahine ke lagana bahut badi baat nahi hoti hai sir aur aapka business to main yahi hai na aisa to nahi hai aapne bola ki aur log jo business kar rahe hai unke aur bhi business hai lekin aapka to yahi business hai na to fir aap isi pe focus kariye. Aap apna hi product jo aap bech rahe hai IndiaMART pe agar aap Google pe search karke dekhiye agar IndiaMART ke alawa koi aur company aati hai waha pe to mat karaiyega sir renewal mai aapko ye bol raha hu baat. Aapko to pata hai na IndiaMART ki value kya hai wo aapko batane ki zaroorat nahi hai sir but respond aayega abhi ek saal hi to hua hai sir ek saal me no loss no profit sir business meri baat suno mai akela hu nahi mere partner hai to mai akela to bhugat nahi sakta kyuki pehle bhi unhone yahi bola tha partner ne ek bar laga ke partner nahi hai aapke aapke partner nahi hai mai aapki history janta hu ek saal se mai review kar raha hu sir akela koi nahi kar sakta ek partner hai akele se nahi ho pata hai mai contact karta hu itna. Han ji partner hi karte hai partner hai sath me tabhi hota hai akele to koi proprietorship firm hai aapki GST me saaf saaf likha hua hai sir. Han to usme likha hua zaroori thodi hai alag alag GST leke fir lagayenge hum ye to humne lagai dusri ki GST. Abhi partner abhi partner kya keh rahe hai sir?
Partner ne mana kar diya sahab ek ek saal me mana kar diya koi baat nahi sir koi dikkat nahi hai wo wo to dekhiye hum aapko convince isliye kar rahe hai sir kyuki aapki profile achi hai aur hame pata hai ki hum aapko business dila sakte hai that is why we are convincing you otherwise hamara koi 28000 me koi target pure hone wala kaam nahi hai hum servicing department se hai aap samjhiye fir se agar aapko yakin nahi ho raha mai apni profile ka ek bar aap jo bhi jo bol rahe ho aap kya kya dene wale ho mere ko WhatsApp pe aur mail kar dena mere ko. Aapki mail id aapki mail id par already maine kal ek mail kiya tha aapne check kiya hai sir? Ek bar aur bhej dena kaun sa kya bhi jo aap bol rahe ho na WhatsApp wala kya kya. Ek bar apni mail kholiye sir aap ek bar mail kholiye apni. Sunil Chawla karke mail hai na aapki? Han. Sunil Chawla293@gmail.com. Han han us pe bhej dena aur ek bar mere ko WhatsApp pe same number WhatsApp pe bhej dena. Kya kya WhatsApp pe bhi bhej deta hu sir aapko. Han aap aap sham tak mere ko update kar dijiye sir apne partner se baat karke na mai aapko abhi dunga aapko. Han ji? Jo bhi hoga mai bata dunga aapko. Sham tak aap mujhe bata dijiye 5 baje tak. Sir public limited company hai hamare hath me cheeze nahi hoti ek bar account delete ho gaya to uske baad to hum kuch bhi nahi kar payenge sari visibility zero ho jayegi fir aap ek mahine baad renew karaiye do mahine baad karaiye wo visibility start hone me bahut time lagega fir. Dedh se do mahine ka samay lagega by lead enquiry call generate hone ke liye aur jo naam aapka chothe panchve number pe dikh raha hai pan India level pe wo khisak ke sabse niche aa jayega aap to naye client ke to pe wo behave karega na fir directory sir. Theek hai. Aap mujhe sham ke 5 baje tak ka time de dijiye mai abhi aapse nahi keh raha hu abhi 1 baja hai aap aaram se discuss kar lijiye aap soch lijiye vichar kar lijiye apne partner se discuss kar lijiye mai 5 baje call karunga aapko Chandan Kumar 5 baje call karke baat karwaiyega meri sir se. Theek hai sir mai 5 baje call karta hu aapko. Ji ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to stop unwanted calls.

- Customer is not getting enough response.

- Customer states he has a partner.



Resolution:

- Executive explained benefits of TrustSeal service.

- Executive offered WhatsApp assistance for filtered buyleads.

- Executive offered to send details on WhatsApp and email.

- Executive explained the value of IndiaMART.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will update by evening after discussing with partner.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, renewal, trustseal, whatsapp
